title: Pixel 3AXL Speakerphone, mic not working
content:
Calling with my phone will work without a single problem, until I go on speakerphone. My microphone then becomes mute for the other person. 
I tried videocalling (WhatsApp) and oddly everything works fine. 
I then assume it's not hardware related, but software?
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
